          <title>
            <string language="en">motor effect, magnetic field lines, magnetic fields, conducting wire, magnets, current flow, magnetic field strength</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">der Bewegungseffekt, magnetisch fangen 
die Zeilen auf, magnetisch auffängt und leiten Leitung,

μαγνητικά πεδία, που διευθύνει το καλώδιο, μαγνήτες, παρούσα 
ροή, ισχύς μαγνητικών πεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">efecto del motor, líneas del campo magnético, 
campos magnéticos, alambre que conduce, imanes, flujo actual, fuerza 
del campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure illustrates the direction of current flowing through Faraday's model electric motor.</string>
